articles.title: Monkeypox, chickenpox or shingles? Infectious diseases experts explain the difference - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Are you protected against shingles if you had chickenpox before? Also, read about why some Singaporeans might be protected against monkeypox, thanks to a past policy.
articles.content:

articles.description: The #GentleMinions trend, which sees large groups of mostly teen boys turn up to watch the new film Minions: The Rise Of Gru in suits, has garnered both love and hate online.
